title: Prepaid card unavailable?
body: I have been trying to enter my league prepaid card but it keeps coming up that there is an issue with the store. I now have to wait 24 because i kept checking too many times. WTF this is so stupid. Please help

replies.body:
Hey there,

At the time of your post there was a known issue relating to prepaid card activation, If you are still experiencing issues please [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) for further assistance.
